languages.text: Спустя пару секунд вам в руки падает золоченый клинок.
After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.
languages.original_text: Спустя пару секунд вам в руки падает золоченый клинок.

traits.locale_text: After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.
After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.
After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.
After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.
After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.
After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.

languages.text: Tras unos momentos, la hoja dorada cae a tus manos.
languages.original_text: After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.

traits.locale_text: Tras unos momentos, la hoja dorada cae a tus manos.

languages.text: 过了一会儿，一把镀金的利刃落入你的手中。
languages.original_text: After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.

traits.locale_text: 过了一会儿，一把镀金的利刃落入你的手中。

languages.text: しばらくすると、金色のブレードがあなたの手の中に落ちる。
languages.original_text: After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.

traits.locale_text: しばらくすると、金色のブレードがあなたの手の中に落ちる。

languages.text: Nach einigen Augenblicken fällt eine vergoldete Klinge in deine Hände.
languages.original_text: After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.

traits.locale_text: Nach einigen Augenblicken fällt eine vergoldete Klinge in deine Hände.

languages.text: Au bout de quelques instants, une lame dorée vous tombe entre les mains.
languages.original_text: After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.

traits.locale_text: Au bout de quelques instants, une lame dorée vous tombe entre les mains.

languages.text: Birkaç saniye sonra eline yaldızlı bir pala düşüyor.
languages.original_text: After a few moments, a gilded blade falls into your hands.

traits.locale_text: Birkaç saniye sonra eline yaldızlı bir pala düşüyor.
